query:
WITH update_info as (
            SELECT protected
            FROM tabular
            WHERE tabular_id = $1
        ), update as (
            UPDATE tabular
            SET deleted_at = $2
            WHERE tabular_id = $1
                AND ((NOT protected) OR $3)
            RETURNING tabular_id
        )
        SELECT (protected OR $3) as "protected!", (SELECT tabular_id from update) from update_info
